Loyallists receive Triple Points on select items excluded from the Friends & Family discount and Power Point offers. Offer valid on items labeled "LOYALLIST TRIPLE POINTS." All other items are excluded from the offer. Offer valid online and in store December 4-15, 2021. Certain designer, brand and leased department exclusions apply. Points are not earned in Nespresso shops, at restaurants in Bloomingdale's, on store services, sales tax, select Bloomingdale's charitable program fees, purchases of third party products sold in billing inserts, and purchases shipped outside the U.S. or its territories, or when redeeming Bloomingdale's Gift Cards and Rewards. On January 1 of each year, 85% of unused points will be forfeited. If multiple point offers are available based on your purchase, you will only receive points for the best offer. Offer valid in U.S. stores only. Offer not valid in Bloomingdale's Outlets. See bloomingdales.com/loyallist/termsandconditions for complete program details.
